# beekyl
## A delicious text editor
### USAGE:
- use the exact file extension when asked (remember the `.` ex: `.py`)
- type the same way you would with any other editor
### requirements:
- python 3.9+
- brain
- fingers (10 prefferably)
### magical powers:
- c++
- python
- java
- javascript
- any other type of text-based file
